mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cookbook (book_id, book_name, book_desc, author_id) VALUES(cookbook_seq.nextval,#{bookName}, #{bookDesc},#{authorId})
mapper.select: SELECT book_id, book_name, book_desc, author_id, u.name authorName FROM ( SELECT CEIL(rownum / #{pageSize}) request_page, book_id, book_name, book_desc, author_id FROM ( SELECT book_id, book_name, book_desc, author_id FROM cookbook) )c JOIN users u on c.author_id = u.id WHERE request_page = #{requestPage}
SELECT c.book_id bookId, c.book_name bookName, c.book_desc bookDesc, c.author_id authorId, u.name authorName FROM cookbook c JOIN users u on c.author_id = u.id

SELECT id, book_id, recipe_name, recipe_time, recipe_level, book_desc, img_file_name, regdate FROM ( SELECT CEIL(rownum / 8), s.id, s.book_id, s.recipe_name, s.recipe_time, s.recipe_level, s.book_desc, s.img_file_name, s.regdate FROM (SELECT u.id, c.book_id, r.recipe_name, r.recipe_time, r.recipe_level, c.book_desc, r.img_file_name, u.regdate FROM cookbook c JOIN recipe r ON c.book_id = r.book_id JOIN users u ON r.writer_id = u.id)s ORDER BY regdate)
